title: Seeking other freshers!
content: Let's be friends and get to know each other, comment your branch

comments.body: I'll be an upcoming fresher in ec campus but yeah it'll be good to have friends in this uni beforehand. So do dm me
Me too! I'm an upcoming fresher at PES EC campus. Feel free to DM, it would be great to connect before college starts!
I say there should be a insta gc or something of the freshers, btw I‚Äôm in the EC campus
There's a pesu discord server. You should join it, it'll help with study material and connecting with a lot of ppl
I joined it and you had to verify that you‚Äôre a student of Pes, can you tell what ID we‚Äôre supposed to put in cuz I put in my PRN and it was invalid
Hey! I'll be joining ec campus this year. Let's connect.
Rr campus blr resident and I‚Äôll be joining pes cs ai mL
There is also an option to login through pesuacademy, try that.

There is also a discord server for the 28' batch. Join!

Anyone from MSc Psychology RR campus

Joining the EC campus for the CSE branch, looking for friends who are freshers, and wanna use their free time for some productive work of coding or something else with me üôÇ

Dude tbh, I have little to no hopes from de ligt, I mean he‚Äôs a great player but he hasn‚Äôt stayed at a single club for more than 3 seasons which is questionable and Madrid was way too good for Atlanta lmao
Laliga imo is gonna be lit. Barca madrid and athletico, all have formed good attacking thirds. But yk who's gonna top the table(üê¢)

Idk about barca man, the olmo signing was good but they already have players at that position plus olmo struggles with injuries, atletico might be good this season as they have made somewhat smart moves in the market
No proper left winger and holding midfielderüò≠. I really wish kessie was still in Barca, used to score bangers
